featured.text: Moreover, bugs that do come in contact with the mist may be resistant to the pesticide.

definition.zh_def: 霧，指懸浮在空氣中的小水滴，通常使能見度降低。
definition.en_def: A collection of tiny water droplets suspended in the air, often reducing visibility.
definition.example: The mist rolled in from the ocean, covering the beach in a soft gray blanket.
